name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Howell

reviews.text: It's next to Tanger Outlet Mall Entrance.
reviews.title: Stay at this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything is this Holiday Inn Express was spotlessly clean. The bathroom (including the shower curtain, the carpet, the air-conditioner, the bedspread and sheets, the hallways, elevator, ice machine and breakfast area.
reviews.title: Cleanest Hotel we have ever stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front desk staff and maids were so friendly. They seemed to really care.
reviews.title: This staff is beyond compare. Awesome!!

reviews.text: As is to be expected at Holiday Inn Express, the hot breakfast was awesome!
reviews.title: Awesome Front Desk!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Due to a HotBuy Secret Hotel we received, this was a great value too.
reviews.title: Good visit but all the staff made it a great stay!

reviews.text: Holiday Inn Express has made some significant changes in the past few years.
reviews.title: Excellent value

reviews.text: I stayed here with two friends as part of a four day shopping trip to various outlet malls. This Holiday Inn Express is adjacent to the Tanger Outlet Mall in Howell, Michigan. It is so close that there is a walkway at the side of the hotel that accesses the mall. The hotel is well maintained with a friendly, efficient staff. Breakfast was plentiful and fresh with all the usual items served at Holiday Inn Express Hotels. I recommend this hotel but especially for those on a shopping trip to Tanger.
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.text: My friend and I stayed at this hotel because we were shopping at the Tanger Outlet Mall next door. We could easily walk to the mall so we could shop, take a break and go back.
reviews.title: Friendly and Convenient

reviews.text: When we checked in the staff was very friendly and accomodating. The room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast the next morning offered good choices and the coffee was hot and delicious. When we checked out, the morning staff was also very friendly.
reviews.title: Best experience ever with Jordan Wiles of Holiday Inn

reviews.text: I rated sleep quality a 3 because I could hear the traffic in the morning. I think it was magnifyed by the rain. Plus, I woke up every time the fan for the air kicked on and off. I think the next time I stay there I will let the fan run.
reviews.title: Elephants above = terrible nights sleep!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just had to hop on here and rant and rave about Jordan Wiles- Guest Experience Champion of Holiday Inn in Howell... the hotel was super clean, smelled GREAT, had an awesome complimentary breakfast every morning, and the entire Holiday inn staff was AWESOME. I haven't had an experience like this ever! In a time of need, my family chose to stay here for safety, and they made us feel just that, safe.
reviews.title: Wonderfully accomodating and very friendly staff

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Howell
description: We know what you are looking for at the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Howell, conveniently located just off I-96 & M-59. Just minutes from beautiful historic downtown Howell, home of the Michigan Challenge Balloonfest, Brighton, Fowlerville and corporations such as Magna, Ogihara and Pepsi, our luxurious facility offers you a home away from home. Start your day smart with our complimentary hot breakfast bar, our signature cinnamon rolls, eggs, meat and many other tempting items. Complete all of your work in our business center, or by using your own laptop with our free wired/wireless HSIA. Go on a shopping spree at the Tanger Outlet Mall, adjacent to the Holiday Inn Express Howell. Enjoy a hot day in Hell, MI, less than 30 minutes away, then have a little taste of Heaven by cooling off in our heated indoor pool. Melt away the stress of the day in our fitness center, then stretch out on our triple sheeted Simmons plush top mattress and watch your favorite program on your 32 LCD television with extended cable channels. The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Howell is looking forward to your arrival.
